description: Try our easy to follow Apple and banana smoothie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Apple,Peanut free
name: Apple and banana smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup milk (or soy or almond milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a blender and mix. Adding ice will make it thicker and creamier.
Pour into a glass and sprinkle some chopped apple and cinnamon on top.
